Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute near Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses temp. rerouted SB Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn; NB State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn: near Kinzie/Dearborn..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kinzie/Dearborn, due to street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Southbound buses will operate via Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State , #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 29 State , 36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and State: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State , #36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and State: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/14th
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt and Damen: due to a street blockage near Damen/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, Damen and over regular route, due to street blockage near Damen/14th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near Grand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near Grand.

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Red Line service to Howard

For service toward Howard, after stopping at Cermak-Chinatown, trains will then be diverted to the above-listed elevated stations, in the opposite order, through Armitage and then make all normal stops from Fullerton to Howard.

For service in areas away from where the Red Line is running

Consider using local bus alternatives through the area where you're traveling, including those to other train lines or where Red Line service has been rerouted to operate.
